title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Spatial Visualization and Sequence Arrangement Skills Using Drone Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental computer programming concepts and basic social-spatial awareness
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Drone-based 3D spatial mapping programming technology can be understood and executed.
Sequential flight paths for drones can be designed using a block-based programming language.
Solutions to address social spatial issues can be proposed based on spatial visualization results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
